price: And [Allah acknowledges] his saying[34], “O my Lord, these are a people who do not believe.”
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: [34] i.e., Allah knows the complaint of Prophet Muhammad (ﷺ) about his people.
